title: EM Lyon Business School
descript: Brings together multiple students from five different engineer schools. The objective is to mix their knowledge and skills while learning the fundamentals of modern management systems.

title: CPE Lyon
descript: General knowledge in electronics, mathematics, signal analysis.  Focus on Big Data, Machine Learning, deploying web services

title: Preparation School les Chartreux
descript: Followed the official formation guidelines of the unique French systems of 2 year of dense preparation to enter an engineering school.

title: French International School of Singapore
descript: Prepared for the french scientific Baccalaureate in the british international section.

title: French International School of Hong Kong
descript: Prepared for the french scientific Baccalaureate in the american international section.
